QuestData.Title: Gardener Fran and the Watering Can
QuestData.Description: You want me to just GIVE you some hops? Pfshh! This is the third time today some little $r like you has come up to me asking for food!$b$bYou want food? Then you'd better work!$b$b<She shoves a watering can into your hand.>$b$bNow go water my plants!
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to Gardener Fran's orders and water 60 of her vegetables.$b$bYou can water plants while mounted.
